definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Putian prefecture (old term)/since 1983, Putian prefecture level city, Fujian

sentences.english: The land was separated into small pieces.
sentences.chinese: 那塊田被分割成小塊田地。

sentences.english: Usually at this time of the year, Fang should be sweating in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 通常一年中這個時候，方應該在田地裏滿頭大汗的。

sentences.english: The fields have reverted to moorland .
sentences.chinese: 這些田地又恢復成荒地。

sentences.english: If a field that was bought, and not of a man's ancestors' possession, be sanctified to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 若人將自己買來的田地，而非祖業，獻於上主。

sentences.english: Chapter five , the estimation of cultivated land resource sustainable use in Hotan region.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，和田地區耕地資源利用持續性評價。

sentences.english: Two races of European corn borers sharing the same field may also be splitting up.
sentences.chinese: 兩種在同一田地裏的歐洲玉米螟蟲也產生了分裂。

sentences.english: His field has been hacked after harvest.
sentences.chinese: 收穫之後他的田地已經翻過了。

sentences.english: All four cases are from Hotan Prefecture, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China.
sentences.chinese: 所有四個病例都來自中國新疆維吾爾自治區和田地區。

sentences.english: Low hilly terrain all around. A HUNDRED CONS are at work in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是丘嶺，一百多個犯人正在田地上工作。

sentences.english: Fallow and recently harvested fields are lighter blue.
sentences.chinese: 未耕作土地及剛收割完畢的田地則呈現淡藍色。

sentences.english: We shall not find a single foot of earth that can be planted with crops to raise food.
sentences.chinese: 我們也不會發現一尺可以種糧的田地。

sentences.english: Upon that, they grew up into two trees.
sentences.chinese: 於是，它們在田地裏長成了兩棵樹。

sentences.english: They want to dike the land to protect it from water.
sentences.chinese: 他們想築堤保護田地以防止洪水。

sentences.english: A fence marked the perimeter of the field.
sentences.chinese: 標明瞭那塊田地的周界。

sentences.english: The farmer built an electric fence around his field to put an end to trespassing .
sentences.chinese: 那農民在他的田地四周築起一道電網，以防閒人侵入。

sentences.english: We sat in a car looked outside can see house and fields.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐在一輛車向窗外望去可以看到房子和田地。

definition: to clear a wild area for cultivation/to put under the plow
to lie idle (of arable land)/fig. rusty because of lack of practice
